name: Alameda County Library Digital Resources
description: Free digital resources including ebooks, audiobooks, databases, and online learning with Alameda County library card
fullDescription: Alameda County Library provides free digital resources including ebooks, audiobooks, databases, and online learning for cardholders.
whatTheyOffer:
- Ebooks and audiobooks via Libby
- Streaming video and music
- Online databases and research tools
- Learning platforms (LinkedIn Learning, etc.)
- Magazines and newspapers
- Language learning resources
howToGetIt:
1. Get an Alameda County Library card (free for residents)
2. Visit aclibrary.org/resource
3. Browse available digital resources
4. Sign in with your library card
5. Access content on any device
keywords: Alameda County Library, digital resources, ebooks, audiobooks, Libby, streaming, LinkedIn Learning, databases, language learning
